rows.label: tev001191_MSG0001
rows.name:
Expanding the effective area of the deflector shields
would require optimizing our energy output by at
least eight percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0002
rows.name:
The only way to accomplish that is by multiplexing our
energy drivers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0003
rows.name:
...All right. I'll prepare a couple of design proposals.
You can bring them to the mechanical team and see
which they think is the most workable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, hello there, [ST:playername ].
Sorry about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0005
rows.name:
I was wrapped up in a conversation about technical
issues with New LA's defenses. ...Which you heard.
Anyway, I didn't even notice you were there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_JNK0010
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev001191_SEL0011
rows.name: Express admiration for Elma's many talents.

rows.label: tev001191_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev001191_SEL0021
rows.name: Show concern that Elma is pushing herself too hard.

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0006
rows.name:
That? Oh, it's nothing. I did a little bit of mechanical
engineering work years ago, but it hardly qualifies
as one of "many" talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0007
rows.name:
Honestly, outside of engineering, combat is my only
noteworthy talent. I can't even cook like Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0008
rows.name:
So I'm determined to see what few talents I do have
put to the best possible use for the people of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0009
rows.name:
That's very kind of you, [ST:playername ].
But you needn't worry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0010
rows.name:
I find drafting mechanical schematics to be a fine way
to relax after all the combat we've seen lately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0011
rows.name:
And besides, in times of need like this, we all need to
contribute in whatever ways we can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0012
rows.name:
I hope you, too, can avoid being constrained by the
constant demands of BLADE, and can put your other
talents to use now and then for the good of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001191_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you aspire to lead just such a life.

rows.label: tev001191_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: tev001191_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you serve New LA best by focusing on BLADE.

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm glad you understand. If everyone used their unique
talents to help everyone else out, I know we'd be able
to survive our current travails.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0014
rows.name:
And beyond that, we'd be better positioned to build a
bright future for all of us here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0015
rows.name:
Then we BLADEs could truly say that we're
"building a legacy."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0016
rows.name:
So you'd prefer to hone a single skill in hopes that it'll
let you make greater contributions to New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hmm. I suppose such a singular focus WOULD let
you perform feats that wouldn't be possible if you
were distracted by other activities...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0018
rows.name:
That way of thinking is a bit...alien to me, but I find
your viewpoint eye-opening. I'm glad we had this talk,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001191_MSG0019
rows.name:
But I will say, if that's going to be your focus, I'll be
expecting great things from you on our next mission.
In fact, I'll make sure it's one only you could complete![ST:wait ]
